## SAS
```{SAS}
proc genmod data = data_poisson;
	by GRP;
   	class TRTA CLASSVAR USUBJID;
    model AVAL = TRTA CLASSVAR /
	noint dist = poisson
	link = log
	offset = OFFSET
	alpha = 0.05;
	repeated SUBJECT = USUBJID / type = unstr corrw covb;
    lsmeans TRTA / exp cl om bylevel;
    ods output lsmeans = lsmean;
run;
```
